About me

I am very responsible, organized, and I have a great facility for interpersonal relationships.

I am a psychologist graduated from the UBA, and since the end of 2020 I am preparing to enter the world of technology in the workplace as Front End Developer. I have taken a lot of courses on Platforms like Udemy, Platzi or Institutions like Coderhouse.

Currently my stack of technologies is: HTML, CSS, JS, JQUERY, REACT, BOOTSTRAP, SASS, GIT, GITHUB. I am very interested in continuing to develop in these technologies, as well as in learning others that help me improve my skills as a front-end developer

Lapa Verde

LAPA VERDE, is a site for a beekeeping campsite located in Costa Rica The technologies used on the site were HTML, CSS, JS, VENOBOX.

Heroes War

HEROES WAR, is a SuperHeroes application that takes data from a free API with more than 500 heroes. The application is used to find out information about each of the heroes, and it also has a game in which 2 heroes fight, and the one with the best stats wins the fight. The technologies used in the project were: HTML, CSS, JS,

See Live Source Code
